'''Primula Brandybuck''' ({{TA|2920}} - {{TA|2980|n}}) was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]], and [[Frodo Baggins]]' mother.

==History==
Primula was the youngest daughter<ref name=party/> of [[Gorbadoc Brandybuck]] and [[Mirabella Took]]. She married [[Drogo Baggins]], with whom she had one child, [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]].<ref>{{App|Brandybuck}}</ref> In late {{SR|1380}}, she and her husband drowned when they went boating on the [[Baranduin|Brandywine River]].<ref name=party>{{FR|Party}}</ref>

==Etymology==
[[wikipedia:Primula|Primula]] is a genus of the [[wikipedia:Primulaceae|primrose family]] of plants. It is the Latin name of the primrose and means "little first" because it flowers in early spring.
